resources.string:
Operation Procedures	
 1.Press :on the Home Screen for reveling Menu.
 2.Click on any note to edit the note on the Note Editor.
 (Tip: The Note will be saved automatically
 when user exits from the Note Editor.)
 3.Press a particular note for long than 3 seconds to delete the note.
 4.Notes can be added using the Add Note Button on the menu.
 5. The Clear All Data will wipe all data previously saved in the application.
 
 Thank you for using this application.
